scripts.build: run-p build:client build:server && yarn run build:functions && babel-node buildSitemap && babel-node buildRss
scripts.build:client: yarn run clean:client && NODE_ENV=production yarn run webpack --config ./scripts/webpack.client-prod.js && yarn run copyfiles -f ./public/*.* ./build
scripts.build:server: yarn run clean:server && NODE_ENV=production yarn run webpack --config ./scripts/webpack.server.js
scripts.build:functions: yarn run clean:functions && NODE_ENV=production yarn run webpack --config ./scripts/webpack.functions.js && yarn run copyfiles -f ./functions/package.json ./functions/build
scripts.watch:server: yarn run webpack --watch --config scripts/webpack.server.js & nodemon --exec NODE_ENV=development babel-node functions/src/server.js --config-file ./scripts/babel.config.js
scripts.analyze: yarn run clean:client && NODE_ENV=production yarn run webpack --config ./scripts/webpack.client-analyze.js
scripts.clean:client: yarn run rimraf ./build && yarn run rimraf ./functions/assets/index.html
